Doesnt seem to work properly on Steam Deck, every video quickly becomes plagued with 'out of disk space' errors even though there is plenty of total space left on my deck. After some investigation it seems like flatpak is limiting the amount of space which the sandboxed /tmp, where miru puts its downloads, is allowed to take up. Perhaps this is a setting in the package which could be changed.
